short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A little extension to be more productive when developing on Webflow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A little extension to be more productive when developing on Webflow
- Quick access page settings (with shortcut too : SHIFT + S)
- Quickly add script and style tag on custom code page settings
